text: Argenta may refer to: ==People== * Argenta (surname) ==Places== * Argenta, British Columbia, Canada, a settlement * Argenta, Emilia–Romagna, Italy, a town and comune in the province of Ferrara * Argenta, Illinois, United States, a village * Argenta Historic District, North Little Rock, Arkansas, United States, on the National Register of Historic Places ==Other uses== * HMS Argenta, a prison ship of the British Armed Forces Royal Navy * Argenta (bank), a Belgian bank * Fiat Argenta, an Italian car * Argenta, the language spoken by the Night Sentinels of Argent D'Nur.
title: Argenta
